results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Calcinosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002114 @@@Calcification@@@ was blunted in vascular smooth muscle cells (VSMCs) by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in a dose-dependent manner (0.5-1.5 mM) compared to control cells (p < 0.01).

results.title: Plaque microstructures during metformin therapy in type 2 diabetic subjects with coronary artery disease: optical coherence tomography analysis.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group demonstrated plaques with a smaller @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ arc (median: 168.7  vs. 208.5 , P=0.008), shorter longitudinal length (media: 5.1 vs. 9.1 mm, P=0.04), and a lower frequency of cholesterol crystal (3.9% vs. 18.2%, P=0.01) and spotty @<m>DISEASE_Calcinosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002114 @@@calcification@@@ (3.9% vs. 34.8%, P=0.008).

citations.NLM: Kataoka Y, Nicholls SJ, Andrews J, Uno K, Kapadia SR, Tuzcu EM, Nissen SE, Puri R.
